original_text: In furious anger and in great wrath the Lord uprooted them from their land and thrust them into another land, as it is now.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 또 진노와 격분과 크게 통한하심으로 그들을 이 땅에서 뽑아내사 다른 나라에 내던지심이 오늘과 같다 하리라

sentences.original_text: In furious anger and in great wrath
the Lord uprooted them from their land
and thrust them into another land
